question: (Supplications)What is the authenticity of the dua quoted in Hiz bul azam 'I take refuge from the time when the hearts will be of the type of non-Arabs (Aajim...'
answer:
QUESTION
Can ?? I take refuge from the time when the hearts will be of the type of non-Arabs (Aajim) and tongues will be of those of Arabs? could you please give the hadith book from where this dua is taken?
ANSWER


Share:
The abovementioned Du'aa is found in Musnad Ahmad (Hadith 22777). Hafiz
Iraaqi has mentioned that this Hadith is a weak narration. (Faydul Qadeer
vol.2 pg.188)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Moulana Muhammad ibn Moulana Haroon Abbassommar
FACULTY OF SPECIALTY IN HADITH
